snippet: Lt. Col. Moatassem Fathi says he has been demoted since a top official he accused of sabotaging corruption investigations was rehabilitated by the military-led government.
abstract: Egyptian corruption investigator Lt Col Moatassem Fathi files complaint charging that government demoted him in retribution for raising accusations of cronyism and self-dealing by Egypt's chief spy Gen Mohamed Farid el-Tohamy and other senior officials.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Col. Moatassem Fathi says he has been demoted since a top official he accused of sabotaging corruption investigations was rehabilitated by the military-led government.

headline.main: Egyptian Graft Investigator Accuses Officials of Retribution
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Graft Investigator Accuses Officials of Retribution

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
